name: Neural Disorders
description: Explore topics in neurological disorders and treatments to reinforce and expand your knowledge of cellular and molecular neurophysiology. Course material is updated yearly to reflect the rapid evolution of ideas in this area.
prerequisites: PSL300H1, PSL301H1, CJH332H1 or permission of instructor

instructors: L Mills A Velumian J Eubanks J Sivak D Weaver
